metadata.title: CVE-2021-45985 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Lua 5.4.3, an erroneous finalizer called during a tail call leads to aheap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4-3
lua5.4 - 5.4.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4-3').
darktable package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
tup package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vifm package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
